mapper.insert: insert into report_co (report_num, reservation_num, reason) values (REPORT_CO_seq.nextVal, #{resNum}, #{reason})
insert into report_user (report_num, reservation_num, reason) values (REPORT_user_seq.nextval, #{resNum}, #{reason})
mapper.delete: delete from report_co where report_num = #{reportNum} AND report_num NOT IN (select A.report_num from REPORT_CO_PROCESS A)
delete from report_user where report_num = #{reportNum} AND report_num NOT IN (select A.report_num from REPORT_USER_PROCESS A)
mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_NUM, RESERVATION_NUM, REASON FROM REPORT_CO
SELECT REPORT_NUM, RESERVATION_NUM, REASON FROM REPORT_USER
SELECT A.REPORT_NUM, A.RESERVATION_NUM, A.REASON FROM REPORT_CO A, (SELECT RESERVATION_NUM AS resNum FROM RESERVATION WHERE #{customerId} = customer_id) B WHERE A.RESERVATION_NUM IN B.resNum
SELECT A.REPORT_NUM, A.RESERVATION_NUM, A.REASON FROM REPORT_USER A, (SELECT RESERVATION_NUM AS resNum FROM RESERVATION WHERE company_id = #{companyId}) B WHERE A.RESERVATION_NUM IN B.resNum
SELECT B.REPORT_NUM, B.reservation_num, B.reason FROM report_co_process A, (SELECT * FROM report_co) B WHERE NOT (A.REPORT_NUM = B.REPORT_NUM)
SELECT B.REPORT_NUM, B.reservation_num, B.reason FROM report_user_process A, (SELECT * FROM report_user) B WHERE NOT (A.REPORT_NUM = B.REPORT_NUM)
mapper.insert: insert into report_co_process (report_num, master_id, result, start_date, end_date) values (#{reportNum}, #{masterId}, #{result}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
insert into report_user_process (report_num, master_id, result, start_date, end_date) values (#{reportNum}, #{masterId}, #{result}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
